credit_line: Gift of George W. George, Class of 1941
title: Cat on a Hot Tin Roof
medium: graphite | ink | white ink | on paper
inscriptions: u.c. in ink: CAT ON A HOT TIN ROOF- [crossed out with crayon]; c.r. in image in ink: RUBE/ GOLDBERG.; l.l. in pencil: for Today/ 3 P.M.; l.c. in pencil: 7 1/4" wide [encircled]; l.r. in pencil: K; verso l.l. in pencil: 87[encircled]; verso l.r.: [remenant of blue label]
